Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory261.png'}
{2: "From the intel we've collected...", 3: '4'}
{2: "It's clear where we must go from here.", 3: '5'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'We need to find a suitable method to track their whereabouts, or at least uncover enough intel to establish a starting point... Right?', 4: '3'}
{2: "That's right.", 3: '10'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Liv, scan the entire block for data. If it was machine or AI logic, we should be able to detect a pattern...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '"Nay all speech, even the commonest speech, has something of song in it." Such is the case for humans, so, too, does it apply to machines.', 4: '2'}
{2: '"On Heroes, Hero-Worship, and the Heroic in History"?', 3: '13'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Right as always, Commandant. In other words, we should look for this element of "song."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I scanned the whole block, and there are multiple data signals... Which one should I track?', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Two of them obviously belong to the Babylonia Task Force. As for the remaining two, one I have never seen before, and the other is from Team "Ouroboros"... That name sounds familiar...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "...Is that Commander Nikola's team? They always seem to be carrying out missions, but no one ever knows what they're about.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'What are they doing here?', 3: '18'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Generally speaking, it's above our pay grade.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Even if you ask, the Commander will just say "no comment."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'So... What should we do?', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Lee', 3: "Tracking the more probable signal of the two Task Force might be the most promising. Even if the program has a disguised ID, it wouldn't be Ouroboros or that signal we've never seen before.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "If it were a signal we've never seen before, wouldn't that be more suspicious?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'As for the two unknown signals, let Asimov check them after we solve the issue in the virtual space.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'At present, we should focus our efforts on solving the more urgent task at hand.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'As long as we find "Bianca"... or any sign of Huaxu, our current problem may be solved.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "The only source of intrusion we've found so far is Huaxu disguising as Bianca.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'So, I believe that is our best shot.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...That makes sense.', 4: '2'}
{2: "Then let's start looking.", 3: '31'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Understood. I'll keep scanning.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory47.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Maintain mind link fluctuation within 0.05%... As long as we keep it within this boundary...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Asimov! Something's wrong!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'What is it?', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Bridget said that the energy reserve is almost emptied to keep the engines operational! Power reduction impact is expandingâ€”the voltage regulators of the bridge and Gestalt can't counter this much fluctuation!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'You mean, if the energy fluctuations expand further...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "...It'll be too late for Gestalt and the Gray Ravens inside.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'If we can use the independent emergency power of the ship, we may be able to hold out a little longer...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Hey, Chief Technician! If you have any ideas, now is the time!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Turn off the thermostatic system in the residential quarters and divert the energy pipeline to Gestalt!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "As for the bridge... We'll have to use some elbow grease.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Apart from what is needed to maintain the immersion... We'll manually transfer all pipelines, and turn off everything that is not necessary.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: '...That seems a bit primitive, but it just might work.', 4: '1'}
